column1: The  Accused-Petitioner  has  filed  this  revision  application  seeking  to  revise  the
order of the Learned High Court Judge of Colombo dated  17.09.2018 in Case No:

refusing 
to 
release 
the  accused-petitioner  on  bail,  pending  an 
HC/4682/2009,

The  accused-petitioner  (hereinafter  referred  to  as  the 
'petitioner')  was  listed  as
witness  no.  02  for the  prosecution  in  case No.  HC/4682/2009.  The petitioner was
treated as  an adverse witness by the prosecution under section  154 of the Evidence
